verses.verse: For the Chief Musician, for Jeduthun. A Psalm of David. I <S%H559>said<s%>, I will take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to my <S%H1870>ways<s%>, That I <S%H2398>sin<s%> not with my <S%H3956>tongue<s%>: I will <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> with a <S%H4269>bridle<s%>, While the wicked is before <S%H7563>me<s%>.
I was <S%H481>dumb<s%> with <S%H1747>silence<s%>, I held my <S%H2814>peace<s%>, even from <S%H2896>good<s%>; And my <S%H3511>sorrow<s%> was <S%H5916>stirred<s%>.

My <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H2552>hot<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> <S%H1901>me<s%>; While I was musing the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H1197>burned<s%>: <S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> I with my <S%H3956>tongue<s%>:
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, make me to <S%H3045>know<s%> mine <S%H7093>end<s%>, And the <S%H4060>measure<s%> of my <S%H3117>days<s%>, what it <S%H3045>is<s%>; Let me know how frail I <S%H2310>am<s%>.

Behold <S%H5414><s%>, thou hast made my <S%H3117>days<s%> as <S%H2947>handbreadths<s%>; And my <S%H2465>life-time<s%> is as nothing before <S%H3605>thee<s%>: Surely every <S%H120>man<s%> at his best <S%H5324>estate<s%> is <S%H3605>altogether<s%> <S%H1892>vanity<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

Surely every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1980>walketh<s%> in a vain <S%H6754>show<s%>; Surely they are <S%H1993>disquieted<s%> in <S%H1892>vain<s%>: He heapeth <S%H6651>up<s%> <S%H3045>riches<s%>, and knoweth not who shall gather <S%H622>them<s%>.
And <S%H136>now<s%>, Lord, what <S%H6960>wait<s%> I <S%H8431>for<s%>? My hope is in thee.
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me from all my <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>: <S%H7760>Make<s%> me not the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of the <S%H5036>foolish<s%>.
I was <S%H481>dumb<s%>, I <S%H6605>opened<s%> not my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; Because thou didst <S%H6213>it<s%>.
Remove <S%H5493><s%> thy <S%H5061>stroke<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> from <S%H3615>me<s%>: I am consumed by the <S%H8409>blow<s%> of thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

When thou with <S%H8433>rebukes<s%> dost <S%H3256>correct<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> for <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, Thou makest his <S%H2530>beauty<s%> to consume <S%H4529>away<s%> like a <S%H6211>moth<s%>: Surely every <S%H120>man<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>

Hear <S%H8085><s%> my <S%H8605>prayer<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and give <S%H238>ear<s%> unto my <S%H7775>cry<s%>; Hold not thy <S%H2790>peace<s%> at my <S%H1832>tears<s%>: For I am a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> with <S%H8453>thee<s%>, A sojourner, as all my fathers <S%H1>were<s%>.
Oh <S%H8159>spare<s%> <S%H1082>me<s%>, that I may recover strength, Before I go <S%H3212>hence<s%>, and be no more.
